titles.title: A bill for the relief of Roco A. Trecosta.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 2/26/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of Defense to settle, adjust, and pay the backpay claim of a named employee of the Department of Defense Overseas Dependent Schools.
